attributes.action: Update his E-Petition facility, improving democracy & participation [1] Let those who oppose a petition sign up as 'against' just as easily as someone can sign 'for' [avoids the tit for tat petitions].  [2] Allow brief [25-30 words maximum] comment / additional argument by those willing to enter them [neutral, for or against]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Update his E-Petition facility 

-  to allow greater democracy & participation by: 

[1] let those who oppose a petition sign up as 'against' just as easily as someone can sign 'for'. 
[avoids the plethora of tit for tat petitions].  

[2] Allow brief [25-30 words maximum] comment / additional argument by those willing to enter them [neutral, for or against]


for example there was a petition for the red arrows and one against, same with faith schools.. often slightly different wording and duration which makes it hard to compare.  

good ideas often feature in e-petitions.  It would be sad to lose the chance to take this forward via a comments - have you considered the impact on... ; or this is done in these countries....; or write to this Uni / council, government dept etc

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
